title: Activity centre: Crash when receiving or accepting contact request from mobile

labels.name: E:Desktop Bugfixes 0.15
labels.description: Misc bug fixes in Desktop app overall for 0.15

body:
### Description

**Steps:** 

1. Send contact request from mobile nightly to Desktop RC 15
2. Observe the result on Desktop RC 15 side

